name: Space ISR
description: Collection, processing, and PED drills for space intelligence flights.

cards.title: Collection Requirement Trace
cards.description: Translate Priority Intelligence Requirements into specific sensor taskings, including justification and expected phenomenology. Ref: AFDP 2-0.
cards.summaryText: Great ISR flights tie PIRs to actual sensor runs Guardians can deliver.

cards.title: PED Battle Rhythm
cards.description: Design Processing, Exploitation, and Dissemination flows with staffing, timelines, and cross-cues across INTs. Ref: AFDP 2-0.
cards.summaryText: PED discipline keeps commanders supplied with timely intel.

cards.title: Orbit Activity Baseline
cards.description: Characterize normal adversary satellite patterns (mean motion, maneuvers, emissions) to detect anomalies quickly. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Baselines let you see the threat when it deviates by centimeters.

cards.title: SIGINT-TLE Correlation
cards.description: Fuse SIGINT intercept windows with TLE-driven pointing to attribute emitters. Ref: AFDP 2-0.
cards.summaryText: Cross-domain fusion is the hallmark of modern ISR.

cards.title: Intelligence Preparation for the Space Environment
cards.description: Execute the IPSE model: define the OE, describe effects, evaluate threats, determine threat COAs. Ref: AFDP 2-0 annex.
cards.summaryText: Treat space like any battlefield by preparing it intel-style.

cards.title: ISR Synchronization Matrix
cards.description: Create a time-phased matrix aligning collection, PED, and supported commander decisions. Ref: AFI 14-153.
cards.summaryText: Synchronization keeps every ISR element rowing together.

cards.title: Allied ISR Integration
cards.description: Map releasability, classification, and coalition PED nodes to include partner data. Ref: Combined Space Ops Vision.
cards.summaryText: Coalition ISR is a force multiplier when planned deliberately.

cards.title: Space Threat Library Update
cards.description: Refresh threat models with new telemetry, cyber indicators, and imagery cues each quarter. Ref: AFDP 2-0.
cards.summaryText: A stale threat library is worse than none—keep it alive.

cards.title: Warning Intelligence Drill
cards.description: Practice building warning intelligence reports with indicators, thresholds, and recommended responses. Ref: AFMAN 14-304.
cards.summaryText: Warning intel should tell commanders what to do, not just what happened.

cards.title: Collection Deck Quality Check
cards.description: Audit the production plan for duplicates, stale requirements, and sensor overload. Ref: AFDP 2-0.
cards.summaryText: Keep the collection deck lean so sensors chase what matters most.

cards.title: Target System Analysis
cards.description: Break down adversary space systems (ground, link, space) to inform targeting nominations. Ref: AFMAN 14-202.
cards.summaryText: Targeting starts with rigorous system analysis across every layer.

cards.title: ISR to STO Handover
cards.description: Package ISR findings for the Space Tasking Order with clear confidence levels and recommended taskings. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Intel only wins when it drives tasking—make the link explicit.
